import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NavbarComponent } from '../navbar/navbar.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-my-activities', standalone: true, imports: [ NavbarComponent ], templateUrl: './my-activities.component.html', styleUrl: './my-activities.component.css' }) export class MyActivitiesComponent { }

Manos Amigas

    {{ activity.detailedDescription }}

    {{ activity.location }}

    {{ activity.startdate | date:'dd/MM/yyyy' }}

    {{ activity.enddate | date:'dd/MM/yyyy' }}

{{ selectedActivity?.title }}

{{ selectedActivity?.detailedDescription }}

  • Beneficio: {{ selectedActivity?.beneficioActividad }}
  • Ubicación: {{ selectedActivity?.location }}
  • Punto de encuentro: {{ selectedActivity?.meetingPoint }}
  • Fecha de Inicio: {{ selectedActivity?.startdate | date:'dd/MM/yyyy' }}
  • Fecha de Finalizacion: {{ selectedActivity?.enddate | date:'dd/MM/yyyy' }}
  • Duración restante: {{ selectedActivity?.remainingTime }}
  • Personas necesarias: {{ selectedActivity?.peopleNeeded }}
